'''Radiant Spincrystal 144''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[A Fragment of Night]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located high up on a ledge on one of the buildings in the [["Masters of the Night-Wind"]] subarea.
